scripts.build:css: postcss --use autoprefixer -b 'last 2 versions' < assets/dist/css/main.css | postcss --use cssnano > assets/dist/css/styles.min.css
scripts.build:fonts: rm -rf assets/dist/fonts && mkdir assets/dist/fonts && cp assets/vendor/fonts/able.ttf assets/dist/fonts/able.ttf
scripts.build:js: rm -rf assets/dist/js && mkdir assets/dist/js && browserify assets/src/js/site/site.js assets/src/js/app/app.js > assets/dist/js/bundle.js -t [ babelify --global ]
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js && npm run build:fonts
scripts.deploy:staging: git checkout dev && git pull origin dev && git push deploy dev
scripts.deploy:prod: git checkout master && git pull origin master && git push deploy master
